nodes.text: Gorset were a species native to Rhamalai. They roamed the plains of Rhamalai in herds of five to two hundred, and were easily domesticated. Denel Moonrunner had a gorset, Chaser, as a pet. Gorset were used to provide power for Rhamalian farm equipment and as transport, and could carry 150 - 200 kilograms.
